price: 16. Yalli baaxô bagul astootiy (qaleelaa kee wohuk kalah tanim kinnuk) laqo gititteh ascossi siinih takke siinih hce, bar cutuuka faxxan baaxoh mohoodoh ascossi siinih kah abe innah.

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.
